title: Once I thought SEA server was the worst
body:
Until I came here to Oceania my understanding of the word 'bad' is completely redefined. 
Players are being toxic from lv1 in 100% of my games. Not 50%, not 75%, it's 100%. There will always be people spamming in chat from the first death till the end.
And there's nothing to be done to resolve this issue. Riot takes no action at all to even mitigate the issue. They just let it happen to continue building their fancy 'League universe', as if their main task is making movies rather than an actual game.
I'm fed up with this shit. I can't believe I've had enough even before ranked and I can't imagine how ranked game will be like in Oceania.

Saying 'why don't you just mute them all' is like when there's a fire in the building and, instead of urging the firefighters to put it off, you tell the others 'why don't you just ignore them and take a detour?'

You might as well remove the chat function as a whole.

replies.body: He's right though, and mute all is the only option.
how bad is it down there in the lvl 6 elo?
